text: Lukáš Bláha (born June 1, 1996) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for Piráti Chomutov of the Czech Extraliga. Bláha made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with Piráti Chomutov during the 2015-16 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Piráti Chomutov players Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen
title: Lukáš Bláha
